AT.name: Runbow Pocket
AT.description: Runbow Pocket is a fast, frantic game where you can conquer over 145 levels in Adventure and The Bowhemoth, or go head to head in Run, Arena, and King of the Hill online. The world changes with each swipe of colour, so you'll have to stay on your toes as platforms and obstacles disappear.

AU.name: Runbow Pocket
AU.description: Runbow Pocket is a fast, frantic game where you can conquer over 145 levels in Adventure and The Bowhemoth, or go head to head in Run, Arena, and King of the Hill online. The world changes with each swipe of colour, so you'll have to stay on your toes as platforms and obstacles disappear.

The world changes with each swipe of colour, so you'll have to stay on your toes as platforms and obstacles disappear.

BE.name: Runbow Pocket
BE.description: Préparez-vous à Runbow ! Runbow est un jeu rapide et frénétique qui vous donnera envie d'y revenir. Les plateformes et les obstacles apparaissent et disparaissent en fonction de la couleur du fond, donc si vous ne pouvez pas voir quelque chose, c'est qu'elle n'existe pas. -145+ niveaux ! -Jouer en Ligne pour 1-4 joueurs !

ES.name: Runbow Pocket
ES.description: Runbow Pocket es un juego rápido y frenético en el que puedes afrontar los 145 niveles de la Aventura y el Bowhemoth, o competir online en la Carrera, la Arena o el Rey de la colina. El mundo cambia con cada pincelada de color, así que vas a tener que tener cuidado cuando las plataformas y los obstáculos desaparezcan.
